definition: suffix of a noun of locality
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner

sentences.english: I modification is to increase this side?
sentences.chinese: 是要为我修饰一下边幅吗？

sentences.english: Be careless in your dress if you must, but keep a tidy soul.
sentences.chinese: 必要时可以不修边幅，但须保持灵魂洁净。

sentences.english: I will bear in mind your smiling appearance.
sentences.chinese: 我会牢谨记住你微笑的样子边幅。

sentences.english: I be a slovenly and untidy person, don't hope me to dress up to let you see.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个不修边幅的人，别指望我打扮给你看。

sentences.english: If you run a bank, you can’t look like a slob.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在管理一家银行，你总不能穿得不修边幅吧。

sentences.english: The work-piece after the absorption is taken out for the polishing of edges, which is then assembled or packaged.
sentences.chinese: 将吸附后的工件取出修理边幅后进行组装或包装。

sentences.english: The Nordic detective is often careworn and rumpled.
sentences.chinese: 北欧的侦探经常疲惫而不修边幅。
你今天看起来明显是修了边幅了。

definition: not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
messy hair and dirty face/bad appearance
to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress

lit. to present oneself confidently to the emperor, without makeup (as did the sister of Yang Guifei 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]) (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) to show one's natural features, without makeup/to present oneself just as one is, without artifice
out of shape/to lose shape/to deform
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
